1.title: Episode #7.1
1.plot: The first blind audition of this season. There are always four coaches and this year these coaches are: Marco Borsato, Douwe Bob, Ilse de Lange and Ali B. The coaches will turn around in their chair when they hear a performer (between the age of 8 and 14) they want in their team. If there are more coaches who want a performer, he or she gets to choose who they want as their coach.

locations: Studio 22 & 24, Studio Hilversum, Hilversum, Noord-Holland, Netherlands
imdb.plot outline: There are four coaches, who are all famous in the music industry. During the blind auditions these coaches will turn around in their chairs when they hear a performer, who is between the age of 8 and 14, they want in their team. If there are more coaches who want a performer, he or she gets to choose who they want as their coach. During the battles there will be two or three contestants from the same team up against eachother. The coach then has to choose one of them to get through to the live finale.
imdb.title: The Voice Kids
plot: There are four coaches, who are all famous in the music industry. During the blind auditions these coaches will turn around in their chairs when they hear a performer, who is between the age of 8 and 14, they want in their team. If there are more coaches who want a performer, he or she gets to choose who they want as their coach. During the battles there will be two or three contestants from the same team up against eachother. The coach then has to choose one of them to get through to the live finale.::ImmeVanGorp
